name: Gun Dice Roll Man
description:
Built solely for the "Game Maker's Tool Kit" game jam (GMTK Jam 2022), for the theme on "Roll of the Dice".

The main gimmick/mechanic here is that you fire dice based on the current type of dice you have. And you can refill your dice ammo based on the kinds of rolls you have previously. So better rolls mean better dice!

Controls
Up/Down/Left/Right arrow keys: Move your character.
Z key: Fire your dice.

You get dice ammo, based on your accumulated rolls for your current dice type.
The higher your total roll score, the better your next dice ammo type you'll have.
3 different dice types exist in this game: 4-sided, 6-sided, and finally 20-sided.

Have fun and explore the game mechanics!
